text:
"I better be on time!"

This article features media that has yet to be released.

To prevent speculation, please add reliable sources to the unreleased media. Any information that is not backed up by citations may be removed.

Thank you!







The Boss Baby 2 is an upcoming American 3D computer-animated comedy film produced by DreamWorks Animation. The sequel to 2017's The Boss Baby, it is scheduled to be released on March 26, 2021 by Universal Pictures.

Voice cast Edit

Alec Baldwin as Theodore Lindsey Templeton (a.k.a The Boss Baby)

Production Edit

In May 2017, DreamWorks Animation announced that a sequel to The Boss Baby was set to be released on March 26, 2021, with Alec Baldwin reprising the title role. On May 17, 2019, it was announced that Tom McGrath will return as director and Jeff Hermann, who produces Bilby and Bird Karma, as well as the upcoming short Marooned, will produce the sequel.

Release Edit

The Boss Baby 2 is scheduled to be released on March 26, 2021 by Universal Pictures.
